dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
dcterms:description: A modified version of the MNIST dataset, consisting of three distinct datasets: one with exclusively green-colored images, another with images having a single color channel (red, green, or blue), and a third with images containing all three color channels. The datasets are designed to evaluate the ability of CNNs to extract color-invariant features.
dcterms:title: Modified MNIST (MD1)

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
dcterms:description: A modified version of the MNIST dataset, consisting of images with a single color channel randomly chosen from red, green, or blue. This dataset is used to assess the performance of CNNs in recognizing color-invariant features.
dcterms:title: Modified MNIST (MD2)

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Corinna Cortes
dcterms:description: A modified version of the MNIST dataset, consisting of images with all three color channels (RGB). This dataset is utilized to evaluate the CNNs' ability to generalize across different color distributions.
dcterms:title: Modified MNIST (MD3)

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A modified version of the FashionMNIST dataset, consisting of images depicting clothing and footwear items, modified to include only green-colored images. This dataset is used to assess the performance of CNNs in recognizing color-invariant features.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST (FD1)

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A modified version of the FashionMNIST dataset, consisting of images depicting clothing and footwear items, modified to include images with a single color channel randomly chosen from red, green, or blue. This dataset is used to evaluate the CNNs' ability to generalize across different color distributions.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST (FD2)

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A modified version of the FashionMNIST dataset, consisting of images depicting clothing and footwear items, modified to include images with all three color channels (RGB). This dataset is utilized to assess the CNNs' ability to extract and utilize color-invariant features.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST (FD3)
